thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Euromoney Institutional Investor Confirms That European Commission Is Conducting An Unannounced Inspection At Brussels Office Of Its RISI Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euromoney Institutional Investor Confirms That European Commission Is Conducting An Unannounced Inspection At Brussels Office Of Its RISI Business
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Euromoney Institutional Investor Plc:
* EUROMONEY INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR - CONFIRMS THAT EUROPEAN COMMISSION IS CONDUCTING AN UNANNOUNCED INSPECTION AT BRUSSELS OFFICE OF ITS RISI BUSINESS
* EUROMONEY INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR - EUROPEAN COMMISSION IS INVESTIGATING THE SECTOR OF KRAFT PAPER IN THE EUROPEAN UNION/EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AREA
* EUROMONEY INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR - RISI IS COMMITTED TO WORKING FULLY WITH THE EUROPEAN COMMISSION DURING THIS PROCESS Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom)
